synopsis.text: Papa's family of Vampirians, a unique breed of vegetarian vampires who drink orange juice instead of blood, have been exiled from Monsterland for their inability to scare humans. To return home, Papa must frighten 1,000 humans using his inventive skills, but his attempts always end in failure. As the family navigates the human world, Papa's daughter Sue falls in love with a human boy named Kou, complicating their goal of returning to Monsterland. With Papa's inventions constantly failing and Sue's newfound romance, will the Vampiyan family ever be able to lift their exile and return home? This horror-comedy follows the family's struggles and adventures in the human world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
